content.html: Years ago I was offered a sabbatical. I refused, because I wanted to stay on top of the things I had going at work at the time. You know what’s funny? I have no recollection of what those specific things were. But I am sure I would remember what I would have done w the time off.
content.value:
Years ago I was offered a sabbatical. I refused, because I wanted to stay on top of the things I had going at work at the time. 
You know what’s funny? I have no recollection of what those specific things were. But I am sure I would remember what I would have done w the time off.
